get.summary: Returns an information about an MP
Returns an MP photo in small size

200.description: an MP photo in small size

get.summary: Returns an information about votings for an MP

200.description: an information about votings for an MP

get.summary: Returns a list of bilateral groups
Returns transcript of the meeting in the HTML format
Returns transcript of the meeting in the PDF format

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: filters interpellations from a MP with a specified ID

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: controls the maximum number of items that may be returned for a single request

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: filters interpellations modified since specified date

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: controls the starting point within the collection of resource results

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: filters interpellations starting from a specified date

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: sorts objects by specified field, to sort in descending order add a minus sign before field name

parameters.name: till
parameters.description: filters interpellations starting before a specified date

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: filters interpellations containing a specified string in a title

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: filters interpellations sent to a specified recipient

get.summary: Returns an interpellation body in HTML format

200.description: an interpellation body in HTML format

get.summary: Returns a list of video transmissions

parameters.name: comm
parameters.description: filters videos for a specified committee

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: controls the maximum number of items that may be returned for a single request

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: controls the starting point within the collection of resource results

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: filters videos starting from a specified date

parameters.name: till
parameters.description: filters videos starting before a specified date

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: filters videos containing a specified string in a title

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: filters videos with a specified type
